name: apple farmer
description: This is my first game on unity!  In the game, you have to collect apples that are falling down from a tree.  It is recommended to play using the app for better quality, but if you use the web browser, put it on full screen. If you play, comment on any glitches and I will respond to them, and try to fix it. If you find any, also type how to replicate it. Only give constructive criticism. Don't just say this game is bad, say this game is bad because...
